wiki.summary: “Reminder (Remix)“ is the official remix to the track ”Reminder“ off of The Weeknd’s hit album, Starboy. The original song focused on the XO lead-man responding to his critics; the remix has Young Thug and A$AP Rocky hop on the track to talk about their own lives and controversies as well. Thugger describes his rise to fame and a sexual relationship, while Rocky talks about a relationship with his girl as well. It was released on August 2, 2017, however, Abel teased the remix prior with two videos on Instagram. Read more on Last.fm.
